hook.text: Your eyes don't land on every word. Some words get skipped entirely.

buildup.text: Fixations are the pauses between saccadesâ€”moments when the eye holds still and processes text.

discovery.text: Content words like nouns and verbs attract fixations. Function words like 'the' are often skipped.

twist.text: Difficult or unexpected words get longer fixations. Your eye lingers when your brain struggles.

climax.text: Eye-tracking reveals exactly where comprehension breaks downâ€”it's all in the pause.

punchline.text: Your eyes reveal what your brain finds hard.
